Title: Organic functionalization in vacuum
Source: Encyclopedia of Interfacial Chemistry: Surf. Science and Electrochemistry
Abstract: © 2018 Elsevier Inc.In this brief review we discuss the functionalisation of chemically reactive surfaces in vacuum. The main focus is on systems where the chemical and physical configuration of the molecule-surface interaction is determined with atomic-scale precision. A discussion of the practical aspects of surface preparation and functionalisation under ultrahigh vacuum conditions is presented first, followed by a discussion of some important examples from the literature.
